name: Between 2 fires v2
description:
THIS IS AN UPDATED VERSION. THIS VERSION DOES NOT COUNT FOR THE GAME JAM

You play as a little ship and you find yourself in the middle of a battle. Kill as many enemies you can by indirect fire. You make points only by killing enemies with the turrets.

WASD or Arrows to move

Left Click or Left Ctr to dodge forward

Right Click or Left Alt to dodge on the spot

Escape to Reload

Enjoy :3
